msbt.message: I wonder if Bunny Day eggs have some sort of special meaning.Like, maybe red ones are supposed to be the color of love and blue ones represent friendship. The white ones are my favorite. I'm guessing they symbolize budding celebrity, .
That Zipper guy is really on edge.I called out to him from behind him in the plaza and he was so startled I could hear his zipper trembling! Wait Why does he have a zipper?

! I just had a Bunny Day epiphany!I believe I may bea Bunny Day egg.<10_4 /> I know, I know. But follow me here.Bunny Day eggs are colorful. I've got a vibrant personality!Bunny Day eggs are delicious. I've got excellent taste!Bunny Day eggs are highly sought after and difficult to findI'm highly sought after, but actually pretty easy to find, so Hmm.
I'm sure my agent's going to call any minute now, !

Have you flown anywhere using a Nook Miles Ticket lately?'Cause according to Wilbur, you may find something special hidden in the rocks at your destination Eggs! Stone eggs! Like, WAY more than you can find around here.I know what you're thinking.<10_4 /> Who needs that many eggs? The real question is Who cares?! These are exclusive limited-time eggs, which means I HAVE to have as many as possible, !
Ahh, the magic of Bunny Day.Soft breezes caressing one's face Plenty of sweet treats to snack on Hitting eggs out of coconut trees That's the nice thing about magic. It doesn't have to make sense!

Bunny Day is, most definitely, the fashion event of the year.It's the only time eggs get to shake off their normally bland exterior and experiment with bold new looks. I used to have an egg fashion line of my very own, but I kept eating my models, .

You know how sometimes when you want to catch a fish, you end up catching an egg instead?WellI've worked out a kind of system that's more reliable than my agent not calling me back.See, eggs have the same size shadow as a medium-sized fish.So if you NEED a fish, go for a tiny shadow or a huge one! You want to maybe catch an egg? Go medium!
